sources.title: 1998 - The Adventures of Ragtime - the little horse with big plans
sources.description:
When a pint-sized pony becomes the ultimate prankster, two bumbling crooks get more than they bargained for! 
Ragtime, a beloved miniature horse, is nabbed by the inept duo Sam and Lester for a ransom. But this clever colt turns the tables, leading the baddies on a wild chase that ends with their capture.

Original Title: The Adventures of Ragtime (1998) | AKA: Barclay's Big Adventure

metadata.Plot: Ragtime is a miniature pet horse and the kids love him. But villains Sam and Lester think Ragtime can be their meal ticket. They kidnap the horse for ransom. The family is worried but before you can say "Home Alone", Ragtime out-smarts the bad guys who are then happy to be hauled off to prison.
metadata.Actors: Shelley Long, Jay Thomas, Perry King
